relevant_findings.general: Patient appeared in mild discomfort from his fracture.
relevant_findings.cardiac: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs, rubs, or gallops.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, nontender, normal bowel sounds, no hepatosplenomegaly.
relevant_findings.skin: Pale, multiple nevi, and ecchymoses over the left shoulder.
relevant_findings.musculoskeletal: Evidence of kyphoscoliosis and multiple areas of tenderness over the posterior left ribs.
relevant_findings.neurological: Reflexes normal, no proximal muscle weakness.

relevant_findings.general: Multiple compression fractures of the thoracic spine without any lytic lesions.
relevant_findings.skeletal: Evidence of severe osteoporosis on dual-energy x-ray absorptiometry.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Repeat dual-energy x-ray absorptiometry showed no significant change in spine, femoral neck, or total hip but a 4.3% improvement in the trochanter.
